Title: SilverPool - game example for SilverLight
Description: A pool game simulator for SilverLight. Demonstrates how to do moving objects and collision calculations in SilverLight.
HomeWiki:
SilverPool is a simple pool game simulator written in SilverLight 3.0. This is not really a game, but could be further developed into one.



Instructions

Click on a ball and hold down the mouse button while dragging to hit it. Click on a free spot to place a ball.

Demo

A live demo is hosted on the link below:

Demo page: http://www.ahlen.name/silverpool
